info.title: Monolith AI
info.description: RAG API for document processing and retrieval

post.description: Register a new user with smart routing for company creation vs joining existing tenant
Authenticate user with email and password, returns JWT token and user info
Refresh access token using refresh token
Logout current user and invalidate session

schema.title: Response Logout Api V1 Auth Logout Post

get.description: Get detailed information about the currently authenticated user

post.description: Send password reset email to user if account exists
Reset user password using token from email (typically handled by Supabase redirect)
Change password for authenticated user (requires current password verification)
Request email change for authenticated user (sends confirmation emails)
Resend email verification for unverified users
Check if an email domain already has an associated tenant/company workspace
Send invitations to join the organization (admin only, max 10 emails per batch)

get.description: Validate an invite token and return invite details if valid
List all invites for the current organization (admin only)

schema.title: Response List Invites Api V1 Invites List Get

post.description: Resend an existing invite (admin only, extends expiry if needed)

get.description: Get current onboarding progress and recommendations for the user

post.description: Mark an onboarding step as complete

get.description: Get all available onboarding steps and their definitions

schema.title: Response Get Available Steps Api V1 Onboarding Steps Get

post.description: Skip an optional onboarding step

get.description: Get all active team members and pending invites for the current organization

patch.description: Update a team member's role (admin only, cannot change own role or demote last admin)

delete.description: Remove a team member from the organization (admin only, soft delete via deactivation)

get.description: Get team member counts by role and pending invites count
Get the current user's complete profile including tenant information

patch.description: Update the current user's profile information (first name, last name)

post.description: Upload a user avatar image (JPEG, PNG, WebP formats, max 5MB)

delete.description: Delete the current user's avatar image
Delete the current user's account (GDPR compliance). Requires email confirmation.

get.description: Check the health status of all system components (database, vector store, AI services)
Get database connection manager statistics and health information

post.description: Reset a specific circuit breaker to closed state. Should only be used after confirming the service is back up.

schema.title: Response Reset Circuit Breaker Api V1 Circuit Breakers Reset  Name  Post

post.description: Upload a single document for processing. Supports PDF, DOCX, CSV, TXT and other formats. File size limit: 50 MB. Optionally organize in folders.

parameters.name: folder_id

schema.description: Folder ID to upload document to
schema.title: Folder Id

parameters.description: Folder ID to upload document to

post.description: Upload multiple documents at once (up to 100 files). Each file is processed independently. File size limit: 50 MB per file. Optionally organize in folders.

parameters.name: folder_id

schema.description: Folder ID to upload all documents to
schema.title: Folder Id

parameters.description: Folder ID to upload all documents to

413.description: One or more files exceed size limit

415.description: One or more files have unsupported type

get.description: Check the processing status of a document upload task
Get paginated list of documents with advanced filtering and sorting options

parameters.name: source_type

schema.description: Filter by source type (single value, deprecated - use source_types)
schema.title: Source Type

parameters.description: Filter by source type (single value, deprecated - use source_types)

parameters.name: processing_status

schema.description: Filter by processing status (single value, deprecated - use processing_statuses)
schema.title: Processing Status

parameters.description: Filter by processing status (single value, deprecated - use processing_statuses)

parameters.name: exclude_failed

schema.description: Exclude documents with FAILED status (default: true)
schema.title: Exclude Failed

parameters.description: Exclude documents with FAILED status (default: true)

parameters.name: created_after

schema.description: Filter documents created after this date
schema.title: Created After

parameters.description: Filter documents created after this date

parameters.name: created_before

schema.description: Filter documents created before this date
schema.title: Created Before

parameters.description: Filter documents created before this date

parameters.name: updated_after

schema.description: Filter documents updated after this date
schema.title: Updated After

parameters.description: Filter documents updated after this date

parameters.name: updated_before

schema.description: Filter documents updated before this date
schema.title: Updated Before

parameters.description: Filter documents updated before this date

parameters.name: extensions

schema.description: Filter by file extensions (e.g., pdf, docx)
schema.title: Extensions

parameters.description: Filter by file extensions (e.g., pdf, docx)

get.description: Get complete document metadata and processing details including chunk count and ACL permissions

delete.description: Delete document and all associated data including vectors, chunks, and storage files

post.description: Perform bulk operations on multiple documents (delete, update_acl, reprocess)

get.description: Get available options for document filters including extensions, mime types, authors, categories, and topics

schema.title: Response Get Document Filter Options Api V1 Documents Filter Options Get

get.description: Download or view the original document file as a streaming response

parameters.name: view

schema.description: Display inline in browser instead of downloading
schema.title: View

parameters.description: Display inline in browser instead of downloading

get.description: Get 150x150px thumbnail image for the document (PDFs and images only)
Get paginated list of folders with hierarchy and search support

post.description: Create a new folder in the hierarchy

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific folder

delete.description: Delete folder and optionally move contents to root level

parameters.name: force

schema.description: Force delete non-empty folder and move contents to root
schema.title: Force

parameters.description: Force delete non-empty folder and move contents to root

post.description: Move folder to a different parent (with circular reference protection)

get.description: Get documents within a specific folder

parameters.name: source_types

schema.description: Comma-separated list of source types to filter by
schema.title: Source Types

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of source types to filter by

schema.title: Response List Folder Documents Api V1 Folders  Folder Id  Documents Get

post.description: Move multiple documents to a specific folder

get.description: Get complete folder hierarchy as a tree structure

schema.title: Response Get Folder Tree Api V1 Folders Tree Get

post.description: Create multiple folders in a hierarchy (supports drag-and-drop folder tree uploads)

get.description: Get current organization/tenant details including settings, limits, and metadata
List all members of the current organization with pagination and filtering

post.description: Fast text-based search across document content, filenames, and metadata (< 500ms)
Advanced hybrid search combining semantic and text search with AI processing (< 1s)

get.description: Get search suggestions for autocomplete based on indexed fields

post.description: Conversational RAG interface with document citations and follow-up support
Real-time streaming chat with documents using Server-Sent Events. Each chunk follows the StreamingChatChunk format with types: 'token', 'citations', 'done', or 'error'.

200.description: Streaming chat response via Server-Sent Events

post.description: Debug endpoint for RAG pipeline with detailed processing info (development only)

schema.title: Response Chat Debug Endpoint Api V1 Chat Debug Post

post.description: Chat endpoint that supports file attachments for immediate context-based Q&A
Real-time streaming chat with file attachments using Server-Sent Events

200.description: Streaming chat response with attachments via Server-Sent Events

post.description: Create a new conversation for the authenticated user.

get.description: List all conversations for the authenticated user with pagination.
Get a specific conversation with optional message history and focus mode info.

patch.description: Update conversation properties (title, archive status, etc.).

delete.description: Delete a conversation and all its messages.

get.description: Get messages for a conversation with optional pagination.

parameters.name: before_id

schema.description: Get messages before this message ID
schema.title: Before Id

parameters.description: Get messages before this message ID

schema.title: Response Get Conversation Messages Api V1 Conversations  Conversation Id  Messages Get

post.description: Delete multiple conversations at once.
Archive or unarchive multiple conversations at once.
Create a new focus mode.

get.description: List user's focus modes.
Get focus mode details with optional documents.

delete.description: Delete focus mode (also removes all document associations).

post.description: Add documents to focus mode.

get.description: List documents in focus mode.

delete.description: Remove a document from focus mode.

get.description: List available documents for focus mode selection.
List all available icons for focus modes.
List all tenants (admin only)

schema.title: Response List Tenants Api V1 Admin Tenants Get

post.description: Create a new tenant organization (super admin only)
Submit user information to join the product waitlist
Grant a specific user access to a document (admin or document uploader only)

delete.description: Remove a user's access to a document (admin or document uploader only)

post.description: Grant a group access to a document (admin or document uploader only)

delete.description: Remove a group's access to a document (admin or document uploader only)

get.description: Start OAuth2 authorization flow for a connector, returns authorization URL

post.description:
Handle OAuth2 callback and exchange authorization code for tokens.

This endpoint is called by the OAuth provider after user authorization.

get.description: Get all available connector types with their configuration schemas and requirements

schema.title: Response List Available Connectors Api V1 Connectors  Get

post.description:
Test a connector configuration without saving it.

This endpoint allows users to validate their credentials and configuration
before creating a permanent connection.

get.description:
Get detailed information about a specific connector type.

Returns authentication requirements, configuration schema,
and other metadata for the specified connector.

post.description: Create a new authenticated connection to an external service with credential validation

get.description: List all connections for the current user and tenant with optional filtering

schema.title: Response List Connections Api V1 Connections  Get

get.description: Get details for a specific connection

put.description: Update an existing connection including credentials and configuration

delete.description: Delete a connection if no active syncs exist

patch.description: Temporarily pause all syncs for a connection while keeping schedules intact
Resume a paused connection and optionally trigger an immediate sync

post.description:
Create a new sync pipeline.

This is the primary way to create data synchronization configurations in Phase 6.
It orchestrates the creation of:
- Sync record (primary configuration)
- DAG (pipeline definition)
- Connection links
- Source connection record (for backwards compatibility)

get.description:
List all sync pipelines for the current tenant.

Supports filtering by status and schedule type.

schema.title: Response List Syncs Api V1 Syncs  Get

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific sync pipeline.

delete.description:
Delete a sync pipeline.

This performs a soft delete by setting status to 'deleted'.

post.description:
Manually trigger a sync pipeline execution.

Creates a new sync job and executes it in the background.

get.description: List sync job history for a specific sync pipeline.

schema.title: Response List Sync Jobs Api V1 Syncs  Sync Id  Jobs Get

get.description: Get execution statistics for a sync pipeline.

parameters.name: days

schema.description: Number of days to include in stats
schema.title: Days

parameters.description: Number of days to include in stats

get.description: Get comprehensive health status of the connector platform including sync jobs and connectors
Get detailed health metrics for sync job operations
Get health status for all available connectors

schema.title: Response Get Connector Health Api V1 Monitoring Connectors Get

get.description: Get list of credentials that will expire within the specified number of days

Browse Google Drive folders and files.

- Use folder_id=None or folder_id='root' to browse My Drive root
- Provide drive_id to browse a specific shared drive
- Returns both folders and files (unless include_files=False)
- Use include_sync_status=true to get sync information (optional enhancement)

parameters.name: folder_id

schema.description: Folder ID to browse, 'root' for My Drive root
schema.title: Folder Id

parameters.description: Folder ID to browse, 'root' for My Drive root

parameters.name: drive_id

schema.description: Shared drive ID if browsing shared drive
schema.title: Drive Id

parameters.description: Shared drive ID if browsing shared drive

get.description:
Search for files in Google Drive.

Search query supports:
- Full text search: searches file names and content
- Operators: 'and', 'or', 'not'
- Example: "report and not draft"

Get hierarchical folder tree structure.

Returns a tree structure of folders up to max_depth levels.
Useful for folder selection UI components.

List all accessible shared drives.

Returns list of shared drives the user has access to.

Get detailed metadata for a specific file.

Returns comprehensive file information including permissions.
Retrieve dead letter queue entries with optional status filter

parameters.name: status

schema.description: Filter by status (pending, retrying, resolved, permanent_failure)
schema.title: Status

parameters.description: Filter by status (pending, retrying, resolved, permanent_failure)

schema.title: Response Get Dlq Entries Api V1 Dlq Entries Get

get.description: Get statistics about documents in the dead letter queue

post.description: Retry processing a document from the dead letter queue

parameters.name: force

schema.description: Force retry even if max attempts reached
schema.title: Force

parameters.description: Force retry even if max attempts reached

patch.description: Mark a DLQ entry as resolved with a resolution description

schema.title: Response Resolve Dlq Entry Api V1 Dlq Entries  Dlq Id  Resolve Patch

patch.description: Mark a DLQ entry as permanent failure (won't retry)

schema.title: Response Mark Permanent Failure Api V1 Dlq Entries  Dlq Id  Permanent Failure Patch

get.description:
Test circuit breaker functionality

Args:
    should_fail: If true, simulates a service failure

Returns:
    Success or failure message

schema.title: Response Test Circuit Breaker Api V1 Test Circuit Breaker  Should Fail  Get

post.description:
Test DLQ by creating a document that will fail processing.

This creates a fake document entry and queues it with an invalid URL
that will cause processing to fail after retries.

schema.title: Response Test Dlq Failure Api V1 Test Dlq Trigger Failure Post
